date.description: The date for which the retargeting data is reported.

country_code.description: Country code associated with the user for geo-targeting analysis.

media_source.description: The media source or platform from which the retargeting traffic originated.

campaign.description: The name or ID of the retargeting campaign.

clicks.description: Total clicks received on retargeting ads.

conversions.description: Total number of conversions attributed to retargeting efforts.

conversion_type.description: Type of conversion achieved through retargeting (e.g., app install, purchase).

conversion_rate.description: The percentage of users who converted after being retargeted.

sessions.description: Total sessions initiated by users as a result of retargeting.

loyal_users.description: Number of loyal users retained through retargeting campaigns.

loyal_users_rate.description: Percentage of users retained as loyal users through retargeting efforts.

total_revenue.description: Total revenue generated through retargeting efforts.

total_cost.description: The total cost incurred for running retargeting campaigns.

return_on_investment.description: The calculated return on investment (ROI) from retargeting activities.

average_revenue_per_user.description: Average revenue generated per user as a result of retargeting activities.

average_ecpi.description: Average Effective Cost Per Install for retargeting campaigns.

account_login_unique_users.description: The number of unique users who logged into their account as a result of retargeting efforts.

account_login_event_counter.description: The count of account login events triggered by retargeting.

account_login_sales.description: Total sales generated from account login events.

af_complete_registration_unique_users.description: Unique users who completed registration as a result of retargeting.

af_complete_registration_event_counter.description: The count of events where users completed registration after retargeting.

af_complete_registration_sales.description: Total sales from users who completed registration due to retargeting.

checkout_success_unique_users.description: Unique users who successfully checked out due to retargeting.

checkout_success_event_counter.description: Number of successful checkouts triggered by retargeting.

checkout_success_sales.description: Total sales from successful checkouts influenced by retargeting.

create_product_complete_unique_users.description: Unique users who completed creating a product through retargeting.

create_product_complete_event_counter.description: Events triggered when users create a complete product after retargeting.

create_product_complete_sales.description: Total sales from users who completed creating a product due to retargeting.

init_appsflyer_id_unique_users.description: Unique users who initialized an AppsFlyer ID via retargeting.

init_appsflyer_id_event_counter.description: Count of events where users initialized an AppsFlyer ID after retargeting.

init_appsflyer_id_sales.description: Total sales from users who initialized an AppsFlyer ID through retargeting.
